text.div:
Nature of Service/Test/Observation

Code Description Deutsch (German) Nederlands (Dutch) Comment Version
a Atomic service/test/observation (test code or treatment code) Einzeluntersuchung Atomische service/test/observatie (testcode of behandelingcode) can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments<p>a single direct observation and would usually be associated with an OM2 and/or OM3 segments added v2.2
c Single observation calculated via a rule or formula from other independent observations (e.g. Alveolar-arterial ratio, cardiac output) Berechnetes Einzelergebnis Enkelvoudige observatie berekend via regels of formule uit andere onafhankelijke observaties (bijv. Alveolair--arteriële gradiënt, hart-minuut-volume) can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments<p>a derived quantity and would usually be associated with an OM6 segment added v2.2
f Functional procedure that may consist of one or more interrelated measures (e.g. glucose tolerance test, creatinine clearance), usually done at different times and/or on different specimens Funktionstest Functionele procedure die kan bestaan uit een of meer gerelateerde metingen (bijv. glucosetolerantietest, creatinineklaring), meestal uitgevoerd op verschillende momenten en/of verschillende monsters can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments<p>See comment for value S added v2.2
p Profile or battery consisting of many independent atomic observations (e.g. SMA12, electrolytes), usually done at one instrument on one specimen Batterieanordnung Profiel of battery bestaande uit vele onafhankelijke atomische observaties (bijv. SMA12, electrolyten), meestal met één instrument op één monster can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments<p>See comment for value S added v2.2
s Superset-a set of batteries or procedures ordered under a single code unit but processed as separate batteries (e.g. routines = CBC, UA, electrolytes)<p>This set indicates that the code being described is used to order multiple service/test/observation b Latte von mehreren Batterieanforderungen (Aufnahmelatte) Superset--een set batteries of procedures aangevraagd onder een enkele aanvraagcode maar behandeld als afzonderlijke batteries (bijv. routines = CBC, UA, electrolyten); Deze set geeft aan dat de bedoelde code wordt gebruikt voor het aanvragen van meerdere services/tests/observaties can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments<p>Codes P, F, and S identify sets (batteries) and should be associated with an OM5 segment that defines the list of elements. The definitions for the contained elements would have to be sent in o added v2.2

name: v2 Nature of Service/Test/Observation
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0174 ( Nature of Service/Test/Observation)

extension.valueString:
can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments

a single direct observation and would usually be associated with an OM2 and/or OM3 segments

concept.display: Atomic service/test/observation (test code or treatment code)

extension.valueString:
can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments

a derived quantity and would usually be associated with an OM6 segment

concept.display: Single observation calculated via a rule or formula from other independent observations (e.g. Alveolar-arterial ratio, cardiac output)

designation.value: Enkelvoudige observatie berekend via regels of formule uit andere onafhankelijke observaties (bijv. Alveolair--arteriële gradiënt, hart-minuut-volume)

extension.valueString:
can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments

See comment for value S

concept.display: Functional procedure that may consist of one or more interrelated measures (e.g. glucose tolerance test, creatinine clearance), usually done at different times and/or on different specimens

designation.value: Functionele procedure die kan bestaan uit een of meer gerelateerde metingen (bijv. glucosetolerantietest, creatinineklaring),  meestal uitgevoerd op verschillende momenten en/of verschillende monsters

extension.valueString:
can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments

See comment for value S

concept.display: Profile or battery consisting of many independent atomic observations (e.g. SMA12, electrolytes), usually done at one instrument on one specimen

designation.value: Profiel of battery bestaande uit vele onafhankelijke atomische observaties (bijv. SMA12, electrolyten), meestal met één instrument op één monster

extension.valueString:
can be associated with one or more OM4 (specimen) segments

Codes P, F, and S identify sets (batteries) and should be associated with an OM5 segment that defines the list of elements. The definitions for the contained elements would have to be sent in o

concept.display:
Superset-a set of batteries or procedures ordered under a single code unit but processed as separate batteries (e.g. routines = CBC, UA, electrolytes)

This set indicates that the code being described is used to order multiple service/test/observation b

designation.value: Superset--een set batteries of procedures aangevraagd onder een enkele aanvraagcode maar behandeld als afzonderlijke batteries (bijv. routines = CBC, UA, electrolyten); Deze set geeft aan dat de bedoelde code wordt gebruikt voor het aanvragen van meerdere services/tests/observaties
